title: Aero 15 - RTX Laptop for Creators
description: Dave2D Review of Aero 15 Y9 with RTX 2080 Max-Q - The best gaming laptop for content creators.  Available Here -   With the new RTX 20 series GPUs from Nvidia, the new Aero 15 X9 and Y9 bring awesome performance to the laptop market. This is one of the best laptops for 3d work, video/photo editing while being a strong gaming laptop.  Background Music Fili - H2)  If you want to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the Join button above!      Purchases made from store links may give me some money.  (It doesnt cost you extra, so please buy everything)
